alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ada County through 330 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Initial Point, or 14 miles southwest of Boise, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kuna around 310 PM MDT. Boise and Blacks Creek Reservoir around 320 PM MDT. Garden City, Meridian and Eagle around 330 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
